## Contoh Visualisasi Data {#example}

Sebagai pembuka, mari kita lihat contoh sederhana visualisasi data geologi menggunakan R:

```{r}
#| label: fig-welcome-plot
#| fig-cap: "Contoh visualisasi hubungan kedalaman vs kadar mineral"
#| warning: false
#| message: false

library(ggplot2)
library(dplyr)

# Simulasi data lubang bor
set.seed(123)
drill_data <- tibble(
  depth_m = seq(0, 100, by = 2),
  grade_pct = 2 + 0.5 * sin(depth_m / 10) + rnorm(51, 0, 0.3),
  rock_type = sample(c("Overburden", "Ore Zone", "Host Rock"), 51, 
                     replace = TRUE, prob = c(0.2, 0.5, 0.3))
)

# Buat plot
ggplot(drill_data, aes(x = depth_m, y = grade_pct, color = rock_type)) +
  geom_line(alpha = 0.7) +
  geom_point(size = 2, alpha = 0.8) +
  scale_color_manual(values = c("Overburden" = "#8B4513", 
                                "Ore Zone" = "#FFD700", 
                                "Host Rock" = "#708090")) +
  labs(
    title = "Profil Kadar Mineral vs Kedalaman",
    x = "Kedalaman (m)",
    y = "Kadar (%)",
    color = "Jenis Batuan"
  ) +
  theme_minimal() +
  theme(legend.position = "bottom")
```
